task.title: V.P.I. Vanilla
task.shortdesc: The name V.P.I. Vanilla is taken from the University's full name, the "Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University."

taskbody.prereq:
Please assemble the following ingredients.
1.5 cups of whole milk
1 cup plus 2 tablespoons of granulated sugar
3 cups of heavy whipping cream
1.5 tablespoons of pure vanilla extract from the Virginia Tech Bookstore
taskbody.context:
This recipe is for a volcanic vanilla treat!
Preparation
Using a hand mixer, combine the milk, sugar and salt until the sugar dissolves
Stir in the heavy cream and vanilla
Cover the mixture and refrigerate it in classroom 3.14159 for 2 hours Creation
Press “Ice Cream” and “Start/Stop” buttons
Pour the mixture through the Easy-Lock Lid With Ingredient Spout and then cover with the Cap With Measurement Cup
Let mix until thickened
Remove ice cream from Cuisinart ICE-60W and enjoy!
